examples.example: 我们一家人围坐在电视机前，愉快地观看精彩节目。

translate.english: Our whole family sit around the TV and happily watch the wonderful programs.

examples.example: 我喜欢在周末的晚上，舒服地躺在沙发上，打开电视机，享受惬意的时光。

translate.english: I like to lie comfortably on the sofa on weekend evenings, turn on the TV and enjoy the pleasant time.

examples.example: 晚饭后，我们一家人开心地坐在电视机前，讨论着有趣的剧情。

translate.english: After dinner, our family happily sits in front of the TV and discusses the interesting plot.
